Bottle cap plant marker: Write the name of the plant on the cap and use it as a marker in your garden.
Bottle cap magnifying glass: Use the cap as a magnifying glass by placing it over a small object to view it through the cap.
Bottle cap lantern: Punch holes in the cap and use it as a lantern by placing a tea light candle inside.
Bottle cap clock: Use the cap as a clock by drawing numbers on the cap and using it to keep track of time.
Bottle cap key holder: Use the cap as a key holder by attaching hooks to the cap and hanging your keys from it.
